All policy terms and conditions are stor: Taqi kamachinaka ukhamaraki wakichawinaka blockchain uksan imatawa, ukhamat taqpacha qhana ukhamaraki jan mayjt'ayasiña utjañapataki.
Blockchain-based insurance uses smart co: Blockchain-an sayt'ata uñjatawix yatiñampi aruskipäwinak apnaqi, ukhamat kamachinak apnaqañataki ukhamaraki mayitanak lurañataki. Cryptocurrency jan ukax nayra qullqi uñstawimpiw pagta, ukhamaraki kamachinakan arunakapax blockchain uksan imatawa. Many claims are processed automatically: Walja mayitanakax jank'aki luratä smart contract kamachimpi kunapachatix uñjata yatiyawix mä uñjata pasañ uñacht'i. Mayitanakatakix juk'amp uñakipañ munata, cuenta uksaru mantam, mayitanak t'aqaru sarxam, ukhamaraki irpiri lurañaru arkxam. Jach'a yatiyawinak churäta kunatix pasäna ukata ukhamaraki kunayman qillqatanak munata. Irnaqirinakas jank'aki uñakipapxi, 24-48 horanak manqhana.
Name: Suti
Our blockchain-powered insurance process: Blockchain-ampi ch'amanchata uñjata lurañax juk'amp jasakiwa, qhanawa, ukhamaraki jank'akiwa

Premiums are calculated based on several: Pagunakax walja yänakan sayt'ata yatxatatawa, ukanakax yänakan jilani uñjata, jan walt'añanak uñjata, nayra yatiyawinaka, ukhamaraki jichha pachana jan walt'añ yatiqaña. Uñjata t'aqanakatakix carronakata jan ukax jakäwi uñjata, yatiyawinak apnaqsna chikt'ata yänakata apnaqawin sayt'ata jilani churata ukax aski lurawinak askichani jisk'a pagunakampi. Mayjata arunak churapxta jisk'a jan walt'añ yatiqatat qhiparu.

Sapa uñjata uñstawix mayjata uñjata ajllitanakaniwa uka yä t'aqan jan walt'añanakapataki. Aruskipapxita taqpacha uñjata yänakan listap jikxatañataki munata chiqan.
When a covered event occurs, verified by: Kunapachatix mä uñjata pasañax utji, uñjata chiqap yatiyawimpi, mayitamax jank'aki luratäni ukhamaraki pagatarakiniwa.
Yes, we accept premium payments in major: Jisa, jach'a cryptocurrencies uksan pagunak jikxatapxta Bitcoin, Ethereum, ukhamaraki stablecoins USDC ukhamaraki DAI ukanakjam.
